lightweight.name: Lightweight
lightweight.effect: Your silicone body is aerodynamic and low in density. Your speed is 7 and whenever you fall, you reduce the distance of the fall by 2 squares. Additionally, your stability decreases by 2 to a minimum of 0. When you are force moved, you are force moved an additional 2 squares.

keeper_of_order.name: Keeper of Order
keeper_of_order.trigger: You or a creature adjacent to you makes a power roll.
keeper_of_order.effect: Remove an edge or a bane on the roll. You can only use this benefit once per round.
